column4: ok i found and installed the NTFS configuration tool, but im not sure where to go from there? do i need to set a mount point? and if so how would i go about finding the "Mounting point"

ok ive had windows xp isntalled.. i downloaded the 8.0x ubuntu version, put the cd in, installed it in the windows environemnt, restarted, selected ubuntu in the boot menu, and voila.. im in ubuntu trying to find the windows partition lol i don't see it anywhere in the places - computer
